data.name: Tower Of Wishes 2: Vikings Collector's Edition (Match 3)
data.detailed_description:
There was once a tower so high, it floated amongst the clouds… Or was it so high that the clouds floated amongst the tower? Regardless, it was rumoured that you could have your wishes granted if you climbed it. It was called… The Tower Of Wishes.

Your Viking party was defeated in a raid, your boat was wrecked, and you washed up on an unknown island, and still, you found the Tower Of Wishes. So were you lucky or unlucky?

Some of your crew, believing that the tower is Bifrost, prepare to climb it. Others have heard the whispers of an ancient tower, which grants your wish once you have climbed it…

Play this modern Match-3, and experience the story of climbing the tower. And in the end, make a choice. Your choice, for the future to be.


Features
✪ Get into the Viking mood!
✪ Pipe Joining, Slider, Memory, Solitaire minigame minigames
✪ 166 levels of fun match making
✪ Extra Pipe and Slider puzzles!
✪ Gameplay options can be changed anytime!
data.about_the_game:
There was once a tower so high, it floated amongst the clouds… Or was it so high that the clouds floated amongst the tower? Regardless, it was rumoured that you could have your wishes granted if you climbed it. It was called… The Tower Of Wishes.

Some of your crew, believing that the tower is Bifrost, prepare to climb it. Others have heard the whispers of an ancient tower, which grants your wish once you have climbed it…

data.short_description: Tower Of Wishes 2: Vikings is a family friendly Match 3 with modern design and aesthetics. The game also includes mini games such as Pipes, Memory, Chain Solitaire and Sliders for that bit of extra fun!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.7
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: 2Ghz
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
